property.name: insertLineageTreeNodeQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.lineage_tree_node ( lineage_tree_node_id, lineage_tree_id, name, description, reference_id, creation_date, attributes ) VALUES ( :LINEAGE_TREE_NODE_ID, :LINEAGE_TREE_ID, :NAME, :DESCRIPTION, :REFERENCE_ID, :CREATION_DATE, :ATTRIBUTES )

property.name: loadLineageTreeNodesQuery
property.value: SELECT lineage_tree_node_id, lineage_tree_id, name, description, reference_id, creation_date, attributes FROM catgenome.lineage_tree_node WHERE lineage_tree_id = ?

property.name: loadLineageTreeNodesByReferenceIdQuery
property.value: SELECT lineage_tree_node_id, lineage_tree_id, name, description, reference_id, creation_date, attributes FROM catgenome.lineage_tree_node WHERE reference_id = ?

property.name: loadLineageTreeNodesByIdQuery
property.value: SELECT lineage_tree_node_id, lineage_tree_id, name, description, reference_id, creation_date, attributes FROM catgenome.lineage_tree_node WHERE lineage_tree_node_id IN (@in@)
